# Scale font and line width (dpi) by changing the size! It will always display stretched.
set terminal svg size 400,300 enhanced fname 'arial'  fsize 10 butt solid
set output 'out.svg'

# Key means label...
set key inside bottom right
set xlabel 'Epoch'
set ylabel 'Mean error'
set title 'Early stopping'
plot  "data.txt" using 1:2 title 'Train - mean error' with lines, \
"data.txt" using 1:3 title 'Test - mean error' with lines, \
"data.txt" using 1:4 title 'Loss function' with lines
